programme.title: Ice Age: The Meltdown
Ledeno doba: Zatopljenje
programme.desc:
Ice Age: The Meltdown: Directed by Carlos Saldanha. With Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Seann William Scott. Manny, Sid, and Diego discover that the ice age is coming to an end, and join everybody for a journey to higher ground. On the trip, they discover that Manny, in fact, is not the last of the woolly mammoths." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0438097/","name":"Ice Age: The Meltdown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAwODg3OTAxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjg2NjYyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Manny, Sid, and Diego discover that the ice age is coming to an end, and join everybody for a journey to higher ground. On the trip, they discover that Manny, in fact, is not the last of the woolly mammoths.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0438097/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jluis1984"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very good for a sequel","reviewBody":"At first, "Ice Age: The Meltdown" looks like the inevitable sequel to the famous 20th Century Fox animated blockbuster, trying to cash in the success of the previous movie. Well, despite being exactly that, this new adventure of the prehistoric mammals manages to stay on its own legs and delivers nothing but great fun becoming a worthy sequel. That alone is an achievement in its own right.

After some years living in peace in a new pack, our old friends Sid the sloth (John Leguizamo), Manny the Mammoth (Ray Romano) and Diego the Sabertooth tiger (Dennis Leary) discover that the ice is melting and a flood will cover the valley they now call home. Soon they organize a migration, but the trip won't be easy, specially for Manny, who begins to believe that he is the last Mammoth on earth.

"The Meltdown" continues with the style of its predecessor both in humor and animation, so those who fell in love with the original will love the sequel too. The difference however, is in the fact that now Manny is our main character. We get to know more about this character apparently anti-social and cynic, but who in the inside feels very lonely after the loss of his family. Sid and Diego make good sidekicks in this adventure and while their roles in the film are somewhat diminished, they still are very well-developed characters. Scrat, the nut-obsessed squirrel is back too in his constant quest for his lost nut, giving slapstick humor of the finest type in every scene he is in.

It is always hard for sequels to live up to the expectations, specially in family-oriented animation films, but director Carlos Saldanha and his team manage to make a funny movie that never gets boring or tiresome (something vital as it is a movie mainly oriented for kids).

While probably the story is not exactly original or complicated, writers Peter Gaulke and Gerry Swallow make up for it with good character development and funny one-liners that fit the movie tone very good. Two new characters, the young possums Crash (Sean William Scott) and Eddie (Josh Peck) are a welcomed addition to the family, as well as Ellie (Queen Latifah), the lost mammoth.

Ellie, Manny and their relationship is a very important subplot in the movie, and one that was perfectly handled by the director and his crew. While Diego's subplot was also interesting and served as basis for very good jokes, it didn't had enough screen-time; a shame in my opinion, but overall the movie was very good.

To summarize, fans of the first "Ice Age" won't be disappointed by "The Meltdown", and sure the movie will give laughs to both kids and their parents. While still not as good as the first one, this sequel breaks the "sequel's curse" and is an entertaining film on its own right. 7/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":268052,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-04-05","keywords":"ice age,sid character,scrat character,manny character,diego character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ice Age 2: The Meltdown","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi110166297","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWUzZjIxZDItY2NkMS00OGU0LWJmNGUtZTlmY2M5ZjUzNjc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWUzZjIxZDItY2NkMS00OGU0LWJmNGUtZTlmY2M5ZjUzNjc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005380/","name":"Ray Romano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000491/","name":"John Leguizamo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001459/","name":"Denis Leary"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0757858/","name":"Carlos Saldanha"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0179259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047265/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0310087/","name":"Peter Gaulke"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0841532/","name":"Gerry Swallow"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2186362/","name":"Jim Hecht"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0438097, Title: Ice Age: The Meltdown, --- Description: Ice Age: The Meltdown: Directed by Carlos Saldanha. With Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Seann William Scott. Manny, Sid, and Diego discover that the ice age is coming to an end, and join everybody for a journey to higher ground. On the trip, they discover that Manny, in fact, is not the last of the woolly mammoths." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0438097/","name":"Ice Age: The Meltdown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAwODg3OTAxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjg2NjYyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Manny, Sid, and Diego discover that the ice age is coming to an end, and join everybody for a journey to higher ground. On the trip, they discover that Manny, in fact, is not the last of the woolly mammoths.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0438097/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"jluis1984","dateCreated":"2006-04-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very good for a sequel","reviewBody":"At first, "Ice Age: The Meltdown" looks like the inevitable sequel to the famous 20th Century Fox animated blockbuster, trying to cash in the success of the previous movie. Well, despite being exactly that, this new adventure of the prehistoric mammals manages to stay on its own legs and delivers nothing but great fun becoming a worthy sequel. That alone is an achievement in its own right.

After some years living in peace in a new pack, our old friends Sid the sloth (John Leguizamo), Manny the Mammoth (Ray Romano) and Diego the Sabertooth tiger (Dennis Leary) discover that the ice is melting and a flood will cover the valley they now call home. Soon they organize a migration, but the trip won't be easy, specially for Manny, who begins to believe that he is the last Mammoth on earth.

"The Meltdown" continues with the style of its predecessor both in humor and animation, so those who fell in love with the original will love the sequel too. The difference however, is in the fact that now Manny is our main character. We get to know more about this character apparently anti-social and cynic, but who in the inside feels very lonely after the loss of his family. Sid and Diego make good sidekicks in this adventure and while their roles in the film are somewhat diminished, they still are very well-developed characters. Scrat, the nut-obsessed squirrel is back too in his constant quest for his lost nut, giving slapstick humor of the finest type in every scene he is in.

It is always hard for sequels to live up to the expectations, specially in family-oriented animation films, but director Carlos Saldanha and his team manage to make a funny movie that never gets boring or tiresome (something vital as it is a movie mainly oriented for kids).

While probably the story is not exactly original or complicated, writers Peter Gaulke and Gerry Swallow make up for it with good character development and funny one-liners that fit the movie tone very good. Two new characters, the young possums Crash (Sean William Scott) and Eddie (Josh Peck) are a welcomed addition to the family, as well as Ellie (Queen Latifah), the lost mammoth.

Ellie, Manny and their relationship is a very important subplot in the movie, and one that was perfectly handled by the director and his crew. While Diego's subplot was also interesting and served as basis for very good jokes, it didn't had enough screen-time; a shame in my opinion, but overall the movie was very good.

To summarize, fans of the first "Ice Age" won't be disappointed by "The Meltdown", and sure the movie will give laughs to both kids and their parents. While still not as good as the first one, this sequel breaks the "sequel's curse" and is an entertaining film on its own right. 7/10","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":268052,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-04-05","keywords":"ice age,sid character,scrat character,manny character,diego character","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ice Age 2: The Meltdown","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi110166297","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWUzZjIxZDItY2NkMS00OGU0LWJmNGUtZTlmY2M5ZjUzNjc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWUzZjIxZDItY2NkMS00OGU0LWJmNGUtZTlmY2M5ZjUzNjc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005380/","name":"Ray Romano","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000491/","name":"John Leguizamo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001459/","name":"Denis Leary"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0757858/","name":"Carlos Saldanha"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0179259/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047265/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0310087/","name":"Peter Gaulke","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0841532/","name":"Gerry Swallow","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2186362/","name":"Jim Hecht"],"duration":"PT1H31M"</script><metacontent="

Step Up 2
programme.desc:
Step Up 2: The Streets: Directed by Jon M. Chu. With Briana Evigan, Robert Hoffman, Adam Sevani, Cassie Ventura. Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1023481/","name":"Step Up 2: The Streets","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc0NzYxOTgxOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTgxMjc1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1023481/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"darkloveforever_101"},"dateCreated":"2008-02-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Moderately fun film","reviewBody":""Step Up 2 the streets" is a movie that is for a fun, "no-thinking" outing. The sequel to the popular "Step Up" was obviously not as good as the first (sequels and prequels never really are) but it was a fun film to watch.

There was a few good comedic scenes, and the street dancing really was incredible, especially at the end of the movie. This kind of movie is obviously going to be a little bit predictable and cheesy, but still- it's fun to see with some friends on a Saturday night.

Also, the soundtrack really helped improve the movie; there were many excellent, cool songs playing throughout the film, such as "The Way I are" by Timbaland and "Low" by Flo-rida ft. T-Pain.

If you give it a chance, you may enjoy it. It depends on whether or not you enjoy feel-good, funny dance movies. If not, then don't go see it! The final verdict: Step Up 2 is a moderately fun film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":86014,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2008-06-04","keywords":"dance off,dancing in the rain,dance movie,dance audition,dance crew","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Step Up 2 the Streets","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1253179673","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MTAyOTYzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDMzNjAyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MTAyOTYzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDMzNjAyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Step Up 2 the Streets Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1382207/","name":"Robert Hoffman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0263759/","name":"Briana Evigan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0144260/","name":"Cassie Ventura"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0160840/","name":"Jon M. programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
Bourneovo naslijeđe
programme.desc: The Bourne Legacy: Directed by Tony Gilroy. With Jeremy Renner, Scott Glenn, Stacy Keach, Edward Norton. An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlum's novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1194173/","name":"The Bourne Legacy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4Njk3MDM1Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODgyOTMxOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlum's novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1194173/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DUKEJBM"},"dateCreated":"2012-08-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Deeper Look At The Bourne Universe And That's A Good Thing!","reviewBody":"As a fan of the Bourne franchise, I enjoyed this deeper look in to that universe. The movie really does feel like one giant glorified DVD extra for that trilogy and I mean that in a good way. Deeper layers are revealed and the intrigue is as good as what we've seen before even though the character motivation isn't as strong across the board. Renner is fabulous as the second generation super spy. My only real complaint about this installment (because it does feel like they are blatantly building for three more films) is that the resolution has no real teeth. Still, it's a very good effort from a very good cast with hints and touches to the Bourne films of the past.\n\nOverall, a thumbs up and a very enjoyable time at the cinema."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":294970,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-09-05","keywords":"wolf,drone,pill,assassin,riding a motorcycle up stairs","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1065461017","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk2MjY1NDIzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI4NjEyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk2MjY1NDIzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI4NjEyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlum's novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719637/","name":"Jeremy Renner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001838/","name":"Rachel Weisz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001570/","name":"Edward Norton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006904/","name":"Tony Gilroy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013175/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006904/","name":"Tony Gilroy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0319659/","name":"Dan Gilroy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524924/","name":"Robert Ludlum"}],"duration":"PT2H15M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Rundown
Dobrodošli u džunglu
programme.desc: The Rundown: Directed by Peter Berg. With Dwayne Johnson, Seann William Scott, Rosario Dawson, Christopher Walken. A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0327850/","name":"The Rundown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWU3ZDYxZjMtZmYyOS00NWQyLTk1MmItNDg4ZWM2ZGQxOTNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxMTY0OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0327850/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chuckrules"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"it was a fun movie","reviewBody":"The Rock's newest one this weekend and found The Rundown to be quite entertaining. Sure, the plot is nothing to sneeze at but casting Christopher Walkin as the lead villain was wonderful. He has a very unique way of playing with the dialogue to make it quite funny. Seann William Scott is pretty darn hysterical and plays the second banana well. The impressive find is Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson's performance. The guy is getting better and better. I found his first one, The Scorpion King, to be fun but not worth collecting. This one might have to be bought though. His years of using a script and improvising in front of a multi-thousand seat auditorium has translated well to the screen and he has a sense of timing and ease in front of the cameras that has been hard won. He obviously can handle the action aspects of the movie too but (as with most action stars) I hear he wants to stretch his wings and perform other stuff. That has the potential to be fine down the line but lets see how he continues with the Action/Comedies first. Should be interesting to see how they do the Walking Tall remake. The original one was a pretty powerful movie with some seriously tense sequences.\n\nHopefully it won't be changed to much. IMDb data; ttnr: 0327850, Title: The Rundown, --- Description: The Rundown: Directed by Peter Berg. With Dwayne Johnson, Seann William Scott, Rosario Dawson, Christopher Walken. A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0327850/","name":"The Rundown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWU3ZDYxZjMtZmYyOS00NWQyLTk1MmItNDg4ZWM2ZGQxOTNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxMTY0OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0327850/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"chuckrules","dateCreated":"2003-10-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"it was a fun movie","reviewBody":"The Rock's newest one this weekend and found The Rundown to be quite entertaining. Sure, the plot is nothing to sneeze at but casting Christopher Walkin as the lead villain was wonderful. He has a very unique way of playing with the dialogue to make it quite funny. Seann William Scott is pretty darn hysterical and plays the second banana well. The impressive find is Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson's performance. The guy is getting better and better. I found his first one, The Scorpion King, to be fun but not worth collecting. This one might have to be bought though. His years of using a script and improvising in front of a multi-thousand seat auditorium has translated well to the screen and he has a sense of timing and ease in front of the cameras that has been hard won. He obviously can handle the action aspects of the movie too but (as with most action stars) I hear he wants to stretch his wings and perform other stuff. That has the potential to be fine down the line but lets see how he continues with the Action/Comedies first. Should be interesting to see how they do the Walking Tall remake. The original one was a pretty powerful movie with some seriously tense sequences.\n\nHopefully it won't be changed to much. Anyway, gonna have to give this one 3/4","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":105304,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2004-03-17","keywords":"jungle,bounty hunter,brazil,gold mine,buddy","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Rundown","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2038871577","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4MDY4Mzg1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTg4MTUyMDI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4MDY4Mzg1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTg4MTUyMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The Rundown","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425005/","name":"Dwayne Johnson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005405/","name":"Seann William Scott","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000686/","name":"Christopher Walken"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000916/","name":"Peter Berg"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242604/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0829739/","name":"R.J. programme.title: The Man Who Wasn't There
Čovjek kojeg nije bilo
programme.desc:
The Man Who Wasn't There: Directed by Joel Coen. With Billy Bob Thornton, Frances McDormand, Michael Badalucco, James Gandolfini. A laconic, chain-smoking barber blackmails his wife's boss and lover for money to invest in dry cleaning, but his plan goes terribly wrong." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0243133/","name":"The Man Who Wasn't There","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjEwMGZkYTgtMTA5Ny00OWFhLTgzMWItYjhhMWUxYTIxNDgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc1NTQxODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A laconic, chain-smoking barber blackmails his wife's boss and lover for money to invest in dry cleaning, but his plan goes terribly wrong.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0243133/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nunculus"},"dateCreated":"2001-11-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"What kind of a man are you?","reviewBody":"It starts as another Coenian postmod pastichey picaresque: Noir Guy (Billy Bob Thornton), a barber, has a souse of a wife (Frances McDormand, floridly cast "against type") who loves bingo and her boss at work, a scheming fat man named Big Dave (James Gandolfini). When a comically inept con man (Jon Polito) comes to town, wanting to find a partner in a new business called "dry cleaning," we can see the signs a block away: Blackmail, best-laid-plans, murder ahead. The emphasis in this extremely academic take--more academic even than the Ph.Dish MILLER'S CROSSING--is on the sociological and political roots of noir. The postwarness, the cold-warness, the sunshine-boomtownness of the movie's mythical Santa Rosa (the location of SHADOW OF A DOUBT--but really, it's just early-Ellroy L.A.) are all underlined and double-underlined.

 So far, so cool--and the movie is far easier to enjoy as a series of Abstracted Noir Components than the similarly suspension-of-disbelief-free LOST HIGHWAY. But then Noir Guy starts contemplating hair. He is the Sisyphus of Noirtown, performing a perfectly stupid task that never ceases to repeat itself, without gathering the slightest meaning. He even, in his blank way, waxes philosophical, like a Marine-town Woyzeck: "I want...I wanna put hair with...dirt, regular house dirt." "Ed, what the heck are ya talkin' about?" "I...Skip it."

 And soon the movie metamorphs into a fedoras-and-Pall-Malls riff on Camus' THE STRANGER. Why does the Man Who Wasn't There kick off the chain of events that brings down all manner of ruination? Jealousy? Boredom? No ordinary human motives will do. And the Coens slyly insert a shyster lawyer (Tony Shalhoub) who's full of dime-store variants on post-structuralist touchstones: he uses the Heisenberg Uncertainty Principle as a sort of Twinkie Defense, and claims that his client is "Modern Man himself!...Indict him, and you are indicting yourself!" All of which, the Coens make clear, is so much malarkey--a way of kidding oneself, substituting entropy for dogma, avoiding the scary unknowableness of being alive.

 Ethan Coen described THE MAN WHO WASN'T THERE as "the movie Martin Heidegger would have made if he had come to Hollywood"--unusually forthright for two guys who are just, aw shucks, entertainers. Like Spielberg's A.I., it uses a perfectedness of technique to render the world as an arrangement of totemic abstractions--pixilated dots that don't add up to a coherent object. The movie gets you, terrifyingly and melancholically, inside the head of a guy for whom the simplest, table-and-chairs stuff is ceasing to make sense. And the brothers use Carter Burwell's variant on Beethoven's "Moonlight Sonata" in a way that's as crazily persistent, and ceaselessly effective, as the insanely repetitive romantic theme from Godard's CONTEMPT. (Not even Godard has used late Beethoven so aptly.) Like BARRY LYNDON, another movie whose central question is "What kind of a man are you?," THE MAN WHO WASN'T THERE has an elusive, smokelike plangency. It's a picture you'll puzzle over, and sigh achingly at its images, for many years to come."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":107599,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-10-26","keywords":"neo noir,chain smoking,santa rosa california,piano,1940s","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Man Who Wasn't There","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3169845529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzZThhNTctYjRmMy00NDU3LWI4MGUtOGQyMmI5Mzg1OTRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzZThhNTctYjRmMy00NDU3LWI4MGUtOGQyMmI5Mzg1OTRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from USA Films"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000671/","name":"Billy Bob Thornton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000531/","name":"Frances McDormand"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0045937/","name":"Michael Badalucco"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001054/","name":"Joel Coen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007554/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0018555/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0068186/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001054/","name":"Joel Coen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001053/","name":"Ethan Coen"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 50 First Dates
50 prvih poljubaca
programme.desc:
50 First Dates: Directed by Peter Segal. With Adam Sandler, Drew Barrymore, Rob Schneider, Sean Astin. Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams until discovering she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the next day." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0343660/","name":"50 First Dates","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAwMzc4MDgxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNjUwMzE3._V1_.jpg","description":"Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams until discovering she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the next day.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0343660/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gavin6942"},"dateCreated":"2016-01-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Surprisingly Good Sandler Comedy","reviewBody":"Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment up until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams, until he discovers she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the very next day.

At first, I just liked some of the usual humor: the use of spam to make me believe we were really in Hawaii. And also Rob Schneider, who is often the funniest person in Sandler's films. (He is still good here, though perhaps not at his best.) 

I was pleasantly surprised that amidst the stupid humor was an actual story about love and the growing bond of two people. There could have been a variety of "Groundhog Day" jokes. And indeed, there were some. But the character Sandler plays is actually quite sweet. Who knew?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":342634,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2004-05-05","keywords":"hawaii,anterograde amnesia,true love,father daughter relationship,neo screwball comedy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"50 First Dates","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi867434777","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTJlZDIyNzYtY2UyMy00YWRlLWFmZGMtZTEwMjI1NmZkZDEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTJlZDIyNzYtY2UyMy00YWRlLWFmZGMtZTEwMjI1NmZkZDEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001191/","name":"Adam Sandler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000106/","name":"Drew Barrymore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001705/","name":"Rob Schneider"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0781842/","name":"Peter Segal"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059609/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017525/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1286500/","name":"George Wing"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0343660, Title: 50 First Dates, --- Description: 50 First Dates: Directed by Peter Segal. With Adam Sandler, Drew Barrymore, Rob Schneider, Sean Astin. Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams until discovering she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the next day." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0343660/","name":"50 First Dates","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAwMzc4MDgxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNjUwMzE3._V1_.jpg","description":"Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams until discovering she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the next day.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0343660/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"gavin6942","dateCreated":"2016-01-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Surprisingly Good Sandler Comedy","reviewBody":"Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment up until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams, until he discovers she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the very next day.

At first, I just liked some of the usual humor: the use of spam to make me believe we were really in Hawaii. And also Rob Schneider, who is often the funniest person in Sandler's films. (He is still good here, though perhaps not at his best.) 

I was pleasantly surprised that amidst the stupid humor was an actual story about love and the growing bond of two people. There could have been a variety of "Groundhog Day" jokes. And indeed, there were some. But the character Sandler plays is actually quite sweet. Who knew?","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":342634,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2004-05-05","keywords":"hawaii,anterograde amnesia,true love,father daughter relationship,neo screwball comedy","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"50 First Dates","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi867434777","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTJlZDIyNzYtY2UyMy00YWRlLWFmZGMtZTEwMjI1NmZkZDEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTJlZDIyNzYtY2UyMy00YWRlLWFmZGMtZTEwMjI1NmZkZDEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001191/","name":"Adam Sandler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000106/","name":"Drew Barrymore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001705/","name":"Rob Schneider"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0781842/","name":"Peter Segal"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059609/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017525/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1286500/","name":"George Wing"],"duration":"PT1H39M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Men in Black II
Ljudi u crnom II
programme.desc: Men in Black II: Directed by Barry Sonnenfeld. With Tommy Lee Jones, Will Smith, Rip Torn, Lara Flynn Boyle. Agent Jay is sent to find Agent Kay and restore his memory after the re-appearance of a case from Kay's past." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120912/","name":"Men in Black II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMxNDA0NTMxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMDE2NzY2._V1_.jpg","description":"Agent Jay is sent to find Agent Kay and restore his memory after the re-appearance of a case from Kay's past.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120912/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Aaron1375"},"dateCreated":"2003-05-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"I think the makers of the film thought we had somewhere to go.","reviewBody":"This movie is the sequel of course to the hit movie "Men In Black". I gave this movie a six, but I felt like being generous (I probably should give it a five). This movie is short. I mean really, really short. There is a short that preceded the movie so that tells you how short this movie is (the short got more laughs than the movie I think). I went to this movie knowing how short it was, but it just went by so fast and the movie was a bit unmemorable that it was a waste of time to drive to the theater. There was no time for character development or much story development. In fact, the opening credit scene itself took four or five minutes. The story has Smith's character trying to get the memory back of Jones character to battle an alien threat. For the most part there isn't much that is funny in this one, but there are a few scenes to make a person chuckle. Then there is the pug dog. I think it had the same screen time as Tommy Lee Jones. It was funny in small doses, but its role was expanded way too much for the sequel. Johnny Knoxville's character was lame as was the main villain, which had looks but no funny dialogue at all. Tony Shaloub is back, and once again his character's role is small and underused. So all in all this is an inferior sequel by all means with just enough to look at to keep you from getting bored. If they ever make a part three, please let them get a director who is capable of making a movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":360073,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2002-07-24","keywords":"lingerie,michael jackson character,calzone,video conference,leather outfit","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1097638425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU2NDUzMDg5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTE0OTIyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU2NDUzMDg5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTE0OTIyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Agent J needs help so he is sent to find Agent K and restore his memory"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000169/","name":"Tommy Lee Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000226/","name":"Will Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001800/","name":"Rip Torn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001756/","name":"Barry Sonnenfeld"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108321/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0192384/","name":"Lowell Cunningham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0330565/","name":"Robert Gordon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0266673/","name":"Barry Fanaro"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
Ledeno doba 3: Dinosauri dolaze
programme.desc:
Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs: Directed by Carlos Saldanha, Michael Thurmeier. With Eunice Cho, Karen Disher, Harrison Fahn, Maile Flanagan. When Sid's attempt to adopt three dinosaur eggs gets him abducted by their real mother to an underground lost world, his friends attempt to rescue him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1080016/","name":"Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzNDkzMTcyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDIzMjM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Sid's attempt to adopt three dinosaur eggs gets him abducted by their real mother to an underground lost world, his friends attempt to rescue him.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1080016/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dudedazzreviews"},"dateCreated":"2010-10-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"A cool addition to the Ice Age series","reviewBody":"I'm a fan of the Ice Age movies and I think they're quite funny to watch and it's one for kids and adults but is a trilogy always a good idea? After Ice Age 2: The Meltdown, a lot has happened for these lovable characters. Now that Ellie and Manny are together, they are going to have a baby which leaves Manny wanting everything to be perfect for when the addition arrives. Diego is bored and takes a look at his attitude and wonders if he's too laid-back about everything. Ice Age wouldn't be Ice Age without Scrat who is still trying to catch that acorn but has met his match when female sabre-tooth squirrel, Scratte, wants the acorn too. After Sid sees how happy Manny and Ellie are, he wants a family of his own so he steals three dinosaur eggs which leads to Sid being kidnapped to a weird underground world where his friends have to save him.

The animation is simply brilliant and very well done and the characters are funnier too, especially the little clips of Scrat and Scratte fighting over the acorn. The story in the movie was very good for a kids' movie and adults can be assured that they will like it too. The jokes were quite funny and there were some sneaky jokes in there for adults but children wouldn't probably see it. Also the one-liners in the movie are pretty funny too, such as when Manny says to Sid, "Don't worry, you'll meet a nice girl with low standards". The cast who lend their voices for our heroes were great too, especially Simon Pegg as Buck who added a bit more of comedy to the movie.

Overall, I would say that this is better than the second movie but not the first. It's a great watch for kids and adults alike and is sure not to disappoint.

Read more reviews at: www.dudedazzmoviereviews.wordpress.com","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":235418,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2009-07-01","keywords":"dinosaur,ice age,sid character,scrat character,manny character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs -- Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3380019993","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMyODMyMDY3MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTg2MTM0Mg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMyODMyMDY3MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTg2MTM0Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Manny, Sid, Diego, et al. encounter the dinosaur population who survived extinction in their tropical paradise, which existed below the thick layers of ice ... until now."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005380/","name":"Ray Romano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000491/","name":"John Leguizamo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001459/","name":"Denis Leary"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0757858/","name":"Carlos Saldanha"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0862211/","name":"Michael Thurmeier"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0179259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047265/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0073850/","name":"Michael Berg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0010004/","name":"Peter Ackerman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718514/","name":"Mike Reiss"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Step Up 3D
Step up 3
programme.desc: Step Up 3D: Directed by Jon M. Chu. With Rick Malambri, Adam Sevani, Sharni Vinson, Alyson Stoner. A tight-knit group of New York City street dancers find themselves pitted against the world's best hip hop dancers in a high-stakes showdown." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1193631/","name":"Step Up 3D","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcxNDU2NTE4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQ1MTEzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A tight-knit group of New York City street dancers find themselves pitted against the world's best hip hop dancers in a high-stakes showdown.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1193631/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jmblfc93"},"dateCreated":"2010-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"How this is getting 3.9/10 i do not know :S!!","reviewBody":"i watched this film yesterday with the girlfriend, and i didn't have high hopes for the film at all, I'm not really into dance/romance movies. But during the film, with each minute i became more and more in love with it. I mean WOW!! step up 3D delivers like no other dance movie out there. This movie was amazing! the 3D was incredible, the dancing was out of this world, the songs on the film were amazing! my and my girlfriend were singing along to them, but the storyline lacked abit, apart from the storyline, Justin Chi has made the perfect dance film! I'm even debating going to see this movie again next week! although the last too step up movies lacked character, the latest instalment in the franchise definitely gives the trilogy the buzz that it needs! i rate this movie 9/10, it would of been 10/10 if the storyline wasn't lacking abit! even if you hate dance movies this movie in definitely worth watching.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":57337,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2010-08-06","keywords":"3d,3 dimensional,competition,bed,false identity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Step Up 3D: Promo Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2734556697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjMyNzIyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjM5MDQzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjMyNzIyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjM5MDQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A tight-knit group of New York City street dancers, including Luke (Malambri) and Natalie (Vinson), team up with NYU freshman Moose (Sevani), and find themselves pitted against the world's best hip hop dancers in a high-stakes showdown that will change their lives forever. I'm even debating going to see this movie again next week! although the last too step up movies lacked character, the latest instalment in the franchise definitely gives the trilogy the buzz that it needs! i rate this movie 9/10, it would of been 10/10 if the storyline wasn't lacking abit! even if you hate dance movies this movie in definitely worth watching.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":57337,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2010-08-06","keywords":"3d,3 dimensional,competition,bed,false identity","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Step Up 3D: Promo Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2734556697","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjMyNzIyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjM5MDQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjMyNzIyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjM5MDQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A tight-knit group of New York City street dancers, including Luke (Malambri) and Natalie (Vinson), team up with NYU freshman Moose (Sevani), and find themselves pitted against the world's best hip hop dancers in a high-stakes showdown that will change their lives forever. programme.title: Paddington
Paddington
programme.desc:
Paddington: Directed by Paul King. With Tim Downie, Madeleine Worrall, Lottie Steer, Geoffrey Palmer. A young Peruvian bear travels to London in search of a home. Finding himself lost and alone at Paddington Station, he meets the kindly Brown family, who offer him a temporary haven." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1109624/","name":"Paddington","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxOTMwOTkwNDZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDEyMTI1NjMx._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Peruvian bear travels to London in search of a home. Finding himself lost and alone at Paddington Station, he meets the kindly Brown family, who offer him a temporary haven.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1109624/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"talentgirl"},"dateCreated":"2014-11-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"An Instant Classic","reviewBody":"I loved it. It didn't matter to me that myself and my husband were watching it without the cover of escorting children, family movies are probably one of the most satisfying things out there to watch when done as well as this one was.

Cute is an understatement to describe Paddington Bear: he is simply warm and cuddly and I fell for him wholeheartedly. I may even add PB to my Christmas list of wants, even at my great old age. 

Adult comedies can engender one or two laughs, if you're lucky, but this family fun trip had me and the audience laughing throughout (apart from the odd serious moments where it wouldn't have been right to do so). 

Everything was right: the colours, the cast (except I'm not a fan of Nicole Kidman: her pert nose, pert bum or whispered speech), and again...I was entranced by the great warmth of the entire piece.

Folks, go see this one, whatever your age, with kids or without. You'll all love it, I'm sure. 

My hubby hadn't wanted to see it, but he thoroughly enjoyed it. Highly recommended. I'm sure it will grace many TV screens at many Christmases for many years to come.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":107941,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2014-11-28","keywords":"bear,paddington station london,talking bear,taxidermist,title spoken by character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi706391833","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk4MjkxMDM5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTkyNzgzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk4MjkxMDM5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTkyNzgzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young English boy befriends a talking bear he finds at a London train station. A live-action feature based on the series of popular children's books by Michael Bond."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0095017/","name":"Hugh Bonneville"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1020089/","name":"Sally Hawkins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0910278/","name":"Julie Walters"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1653753/","name":"Paul King"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0413801/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0079764/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1653753/","name":"Paul King"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0566100/","name":"Hamish McColl"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1286491/","name":"Michael Bond"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bijes pod kontrolom
programme.desc: Charlie uzrujava svoje susjede jer se sastaje sa svojim klijentima kod kuće. Charlie uzrujava svoje susjede jer se sastaje sa svojim klijentima kod kuće.

credits.actor: Vin Diesel, Jordi Mollà, Matt Nable, Karl Urban, Katee Sackhoff, Dave Bautista, Raoul Max Trujillo, Bokeem Woodbine
Alain Moussi, Georges St-Pierre, T.J. Storm, Matthew Ziff, Sam Medina, Dave Bautista, Sue-Lynn Ansari, Darren Shahlavi

programme.title: Kingsman: Shërbimi Sekret
programme.desc: Colin Firth, Samuel L. Jackson. Ndërkohë që një gjeni teknologjie kërcënon botën, nje agjenci sekrete rekruton një të ri problematik por premtues dhe e fut në programin stërvitor super të vështirë...

programme.title: Legjenda e Ridikut
programme.desc: V.Diesel. U bënë 5 vjet që Ridiku endet nga 1 planet në tjetrin për t'u shpetuar gjuetarëve të shpërblimit te vendosur mbi kokën e tij. Tani ndodhet në planetin Helion, i pushtuar nga forcat e Lordit Marshall që do te asgjesoje racen njerëzore.

programme.title: Lindja e dragoit
programme.desc: Philip Ng, Yu Xia. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të dyluftimit midis Bruce Lee dhe murgut shaolin Wong Jack Man, në vitet 1960. Një dyluftim që e ktheu Bruce Lee në një legjendë të arteve marciale.

programme.title: Kufiri vertikal
programme.desc: C.O'donnell. Kandidat për Çmimin BAFTA. Një alpinist i ri ndërmerr një tentativë të rrezikshme për të shpëtuar jetën e së motrës në majën e një nga maleve më të larta në botë, duke sfiduar kufijte e tij dhe kushtet e veshtira natyrore.

programme.title: Kodi Momentum
programme.desc: Olga Kurylenko, James Purefoy. Pasi identiteti i saj i vërtetë zbulohet gjatë vjedhjes së disa diamantëve, nje eksperte e misioneve të fshehta vihet nën shënjestrën e një vrasësi profesionist...

programme.title: Plan arratie 2
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone, 50 Cent. Vite pasi luftoi të dilte nga burgu i paarratisshëm, Rei drejton nje ndër grupet më të mira të sigurisë së lartë. Kur një prej antarëve të tij zhduket, atij i duhet të kthehet tek ferri nga i cili u arratis.

programme.title: Misioni antiterror 2: Gjuetia
programme.desc: 2019. Kapiteni i një ekipi të forcave speciale kapet rob nga një organizatë terroriste. Anëtarët e ekipit organizojnë një mision të rrezikshëm shpëtimi dhe bashkojnë forcat t'i mbijetojnë misionit pa lënë asnjë ushtar tjetër pas.

programme.title: Njeriu i Hekurt 3
programme.desc: R. Downey Jr, rikthehet në rolin e miliarderit Toni Stark, i cili më kostumin e tij mund te përballet pothuajse me çdo gjë. Por këtë herë, ai ka përballë një armik që nuk njeh asnjë limit...

programme.title: Dita e Bastijës
programme.desc: 2016. Idris Elba, Richard Madden. Një agjent i CIA-s, shkel urdhrat e dhëna dhe krijon një aleancë të pazakontë me një grabitës të ri, për të ndalur një sulm terrorist në Paris...

programme.title: Indiana Jones
programme.desc: Harrison Ford. Arkeologu, Indiana Jones duhet të gjejë me çdo mënyrë Arkën e Humbur, përpara se të bjerë në dorë të nazistëve, të cilët duan ta përdorin për dominimin total të Botës. Film fitues i 4 çmimeve Oskar.

programme.title: Titanët e Paqësorit 2:Rebelimi
programme.desc: 2018. Me John Boyega. Piloti rebel Xheik Pentekost do të bashkojë forcat me hakeren 15-vjeçare dhe me ish-kolegun e tij, kundër një kërcënimi të ri alien. Ata do ta çojnë në një shkallë tjetër këte aventurë spektakolare.

programme.title: Në kohë
programme.desc: Justin Timberlake, Amanda Seyfried. Në të ardhmen e afërt, kur askush nuk plaket mbi 25 vjeç, të pasurit jetojnë përgjithmonë duke blerë kohë, ndërsa të varfërit duhet të gjejnë mënyra të tjera për të jetuar çdo ditë dhe çdo sekondë...

programme.title: Mercenarët
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone, Jason Statham, Jet Li, Mickey Rourke, Steve Austin, Arnold Schwarzenegger. Një skuadër mercenarësh që dërgohen për të përmbysur regjimin e një diktatori, kuptojnë se kanë rënë pre e një kurthi që mund t'ju marrë jetën...

dramë

programme.title: Një natë për qejf
programme.desc: Lisa Kudrow, Kaitlyn Dever, Beanie Feldstein. Emi dhe Molli kuptojnë se duhet të kishin mësuar më pak dhe të ishin argëtuar më shumë gjatë gjimnazit. Në prag të diplomimit, ato vendosin të festojnë brenda një nate, sa për 4 vjet gjimnazi...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Ngritja e fajkoit
programme.desc: Regjisor John Wynn. Me Robert Patrick. Viti 1241. Dy vëllezër duhet të mbrojnë shtëpitë dhe fshatin e tyre, kundër hordhisë së egër të ushtrisë më të madhe që bota ka njohur ndonjëherë, asaj Mongole.
programme.category: Aksion
dramë
histori

programme.title: Të jesh baba
programme.desc: Kevin Hart. Bazauar në histori të vërtetë dhe emocionuese. Një baba, vendos të rris i vetëm vajzën e tij, pas vdekjes së papritur të gruas vetëm një ditë pas lindjes.
programme.category: Dramë
Komedi

programme.title: E drejta për armë
programme.desc: Me Ryan Phillippe. Vik Dejvis, Agjent i Shërbimit Sekret, e gjen veten duke luftuar i vetëm, për të ndaluar një operacion terrorist dhe rrëmbimin e vajzës së një Gjykatëse në Gjykatën e lartë, shoqe e djalit të tij.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Fëmijët
programme.desc: Paola Cortellesi, Valerio Mastandrea. Sara dhe Nikola janë të martuar dhe të dashuruar. Ata kanë një vajzë 6-vjeçare dhe bëjnë një jetë të lumtur. Ardhja e fëmijës së dytë, ama, prish ekuilibrin e të gjithë familjes, duke zbuluar krisje në marrëdhënien e.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Logan
programme.desc: 2017. Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart. Në të ardhmen e afërt, Logan i lodhur nga vite luftimesh e arratie, kujdeset për profesorin X në fshehtësi. Por bota e tyre kthehet përmbys kur një vajzë e re mutante kërkon ndihmën e tyre për të mbijetuar.
programme.category: Aksion
dramë
fantashkencë

programme.title: Tolo Tolo
programme.desc: Checco Zalone. Pasi largohet nga atdheu prej problemeve financiare, Keko gjen mikëpritje në Afrikë. Por situata delikate politike e detyron atë të largohet sërish dhe të ndërrmarrë udhëtimin e trazuar të emigrantëve për t'u kthyer në Itali.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Riprodhuesi i filmave
programme.desc: Jack Black. Majku zbulon se të gjitha kasetat që merr me qera shoku i tij Xherri, janë çmagnetizuar. Për të mos e humbur vendin e punes, Xherri propozon të xhirojne ata vetë një version të ri të filmave te prishur.

programme.title: Si krijohet një vajzë
programme.desc: Bazuar në romanin me të njëjtin emër. Një 16-vjeçare e zgjuar dhe ambicioze sheh një mundësi për të ndryshuar jetën e saj të thjeshtë kur punësohet nga një revistë muzikore. Por çfarë është e gatshme ajo të bëjë për t'u njohur si kritike rroku?

programme.title: Balerini misterioz
programme.desc: Helena, një luleshitëse e ndrojtur dhe zemërmirë takon burrin ideal në një ballo me maska. Pasi ajo dhe mikesha e saj përpiqen të zbulojnë identitetin e tij, Helena mëson se burri i përkryer mund të jetë prej kohësh krah saj...

programme.title: Para të hënës
programme.desc: Dy miq të ngushtë përfshihen në një aksident automobilistik me një bos të pamëshirshëm, i cili, në vend të dëmshpërblimit, i ngarkon me një mision të pamundur, që lidhet ngushtë me një vezë pashke misterioze...

programme.title: Hot shots 2
programme.desc: Charlie Sheen, Lloyd Bridges, Valeria Golino. Parodi e filmit 'Rambo'. Toper Harli, rikthehet me një mision të ri. Këtë herë ai do të shkojë në Irak, për të shpëtuar disa pengje dhe skuadrat e shpëtimit që dështuan njëra pas tjetrës...

programme.title: Mike për vdekje
programme.desc: Claudia Gerini, Cristiana Capotondi, Sabrina Impacciatore. Në një ishull përrallor në jug të Italisë, tri gra të cilat ndajnë një sekret që i ka bërë mike për vdekje, detyrohen të bashkëpunojnë për të shpëtuar nga një hetues i policisë..

programme.title: 6 ditë, 7 netë
programme.desc: Harrison Ford, Anne Heche. Redaktorja e një reviste njujorkeze dhe piloti Quinn Harris duhet të lënë pas antipatine e ndërsjellë nëse duan te mbijetojnë pas një aksidenti me avion në një ishull të pabanuar.

programme.title: Dasma e madhe
programme.desc: Robert De Niro, Susan Sarandon, Katherine Heigl, Diane Keaton, Amanda Seyfried, etj. Nje familje moderne, përpiqet t'i mbijetojë përgatitjeve për një dasmë që rrezikon të kthehet në një katrahurë të vërtetë...

programme.title: Shtëpia jonë
programme.desc: B.Stiller, D.Barrymore. Aleksi dhe Nensi, sapo kanë gjetur një goxha shtepi të re, por ata s'e prisnin që shtëpia të jepej bashke me një plake gernjare që s'pranon te ike dhe as të vdese dhe endrra e tyre per shtepine do te kthehet në makth.

programme.title: Diell me rrëshekë
programme.desc: Me Checco Zalone. Kjo është historia e marrëdhënies së veçantë të një babai me të birin, në nje udhëtim nga veriu në jug të Italisë, e 'spërkatur' me humorin origjinal të Zalones.

programme.title: Spiunia
programme.desc: 2015. Melissa McCarthy, Jason Statham. Një analiste e CIA-s, e cila s'ka marrë kurrë pjesë në aksion, del vullnetare për t'u futur me një mision të fshehtë në një organizatë kriminale dhe për të ndalur një katastrofë globale.

programme.title: I forti 2: Shënuesi më i mirë
programme.desc: Seann William Scott, Liev Schreiber. Pas disa dëmtimeve, lojtari i hokeit Dag Glat, detyrohet të lë sportin dhe të ulet e të punojë si agjent sigurimesh. Por, kur bien këmbanat e një sfide, ai do të bëjë gjithçka që të rifitojë lavdinë.

programme.title: Ngrohësit e stolave 2
programme.desc: asi një aksident turpërues i zeron çdo mundësi për të luajtur në një ekip profesionistësh bejsbolli, një i ri, tani me profesion avokat, detyrohet nga shefi i tij të menaxhojë skuadrën e softbollit të kompanisë dhe ta çojë atë drejt fitores. Por ka një problem: avokatëve nuk u jepet për të luajtur...

programme.title: Brixhet Xhons 2
programme.desc: Renee Zellweger, Hugh Grant, Colin Firth. Duket se Brixhet Xhons, më në fund ka gjetur burrin e ëndrrave. Por përfshirja e ish të dashurit në jetën e saj dhe një sërë dilemash të tjera, do ta çojnë sërish tek ditari.

programme.title: Jeta e nëntë e Luis Draksit
programme.desc: 2016. Jamie Dornan, Aiden Longworth. Një neurolog që fillon të studiojë rastin e një 9 vjeçari që i ka shpëtuar shpesh vdekjes, zhtyet në një mister që teston kufirin midis fantazisë dhe realitetit.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Përsosmëria
programme.desc: Pas një tërheqjeje të detyruar në karrierë, një violonçeliste gjeni mëson se mentorët e saj të vjetër kanë një studente të re të talentuar. Takimi i dy virtuozeve do të shoqërohet me pasoja shokuese.
programme.category: Horror psikologjik
thriller

programme.title: Kafshë Nokturne
programme.desc: Amy Adams, Jake Gyllenhaal. Pronarja e një galerie arti lexon një roman të shkruar nga ish bashkëshorti i saj dhe fillon të dyshojë se historia e frikshme është e frymëzuar nga martesa e tyre dhe se jeta e saj është në rrezik.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Të vërtetat e fshehura
programme.desc: Harrison Ford, Michelle Pfeiffer. Vegime të frikshme, zëra misterioze, sekrete që rrezikojnë te shkatërrojnë lidhjen e një çifti në dukje të lumtur.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Shpërblesa
programme.desc: Regjia: Ron Howard; Aktorët: Mel Gibson, Rene Russo. Në lidhje të drejtpërdrejtë televizive, nje ofertë provokuese, 2 milione dollarë, për kokën e rrëmbyesit të djalit të tij. Dikush duhet të paguajë.
programme.category: Thriller
krim

programme.title: Loja
programme.desc: Michael Douglas, Sean Penn. Me rastin e ditëlindjes, një biznesmen i suksesshëm do të marrë nga i vëllai një dhuratë të pazakontë: do të bëhet pjesëmarrës i një loje të rrezikshme psikologjike me një fund befasues...
programme.category: Thriller
mister

programme.title: King: Histori hakmarrjeje
programme.desc: Chadwick Boseman, Luke Evans, Alfred Molina. Në një përpjekje të pamëshirshme për t'u hakmarrë ndaj vrasjes së motrës së tij, një njeri misterioz nga Afrika e Jugut arrin të depërtojë një rrjet keqbërësish elitar në Los Anxhelos.
programme.category: Aksion
Thriller

programme.title: Unë jam Leri
programme.desc: Prindërit e një djali me autizëm që gjen ngushëllim vetëm tek tableti i tij, përpiqen dëshpërimisht të shpëtojnë të voglin e tyre nga "Leri", përbindëshi prapa ekranit që përdor teknologjinë për të hyrë në botën tonë.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: 47 metra nën det
programme.desc: 2017. Mandy Moore, Claire Holt. Dy motra me pushime në Meksikë, bllokohen në një kafaz hekuri 47 metra nën det. Me vetëm 1 orë oksigjen dhe me peshkaqenë të shumtë që sillen rrotull, ato duhet të gjejnë sa më shpejt një mënyrë për të mbijetuar.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Në hijen e hënës
programme.desc: Një oficer policie me ambicie për t'u bërë detektiv, vihet në gjurmët e një vrasëseje seriale që shfaqet çdo 9 vjet. Kur krimet e saj fillojnë të sfidojnë çdo shpjegim shkencor, fiksimi i tij për të vërtetën kërcënon t'i shkatërrojë karrierën, familjen dh.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
thriller

programme.title: Lufta e botëve
programme.desc: Tom Cruise, Dakota Fanning. Ndërkohë qe Toka sulmohet nga një racë jashtëtokësore që shfaros gjithçka i del përpara, një njeri përpiqet të mbijetojë dhe të mbrojë fëmijët e tij.
programme.category: Fantashkencë

programme.title: Trafiku
programme.desc: Dy të dashuruar që vendosin të kalojnë një fundjave romantike larg qytetit, bëhen shenjestra e një bande të rrezikshme kriminelësh, të gatshëm të bëjnë gjithçka për të mbrojtur sekretet e tyre të errëta.
programme.category: Horror
thriller

programme.title: Në terr
programme.desc: Maria Bello, Sean Bean. Një grua përjeton tmerrin më të madh të jetës se saj... e bija mbytet. E torturuar nga kujtimet e saj, ajo mëson për Tokën e të vdekurve prej nga ku vjen një legjendë shpresedhenese.
programme.category: Horror
mister

programme.title: Bankomati
programme.desc: Alice Eve, Josh Peck, Brian Geraghty. Në përpjekje për të marrë parà, tre kolegë ndalojnë në një bankomat. Por kur bllokohen brenda kabinës së bankomatit nga një njeri misterioz, dalja prej aty do të jetë një çështje për jetë a vdekje.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Fqinjët poshtë
programme.desc: Një grua shtatëzënë lidh shoqëri me fqinjën poshtë, e cila gjithashtu është në pritje të ëmbël. Por marrëdhënia e tyre merr një kthesë të errët pas një aksidenti tragjik.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: 1998. Jean Reno, Michael Lerner. Ndikuar nga rrezatimi i disa eksperimenteve bërthamore, Godzilla, ky përbindësh gjigand do të terrorizoje botën mbarë. A do t'ia dalë mbanë e gjithe ushtria amerikane ta mposhtë?
programme.category: Fantashkencë

programme.title: Shenja e pilivesës
programme.desc: K.Costner, S.Thompson. E shoqja e Xho Derrou vdiq gjatë një misioni të kryqit të kuq. Edhe pse ateist, ai fillon të besojë se ajo kërkon të komunikojë me të përmes pacienteve të tij në shtratin e vdekjes, për t'i thënë diçka të rëndësishme.
programme.category: Fantazi
mister

programme.title: Mina
programme.desc: 2016. Armie Hammer. I bllokuar në shkretëtirë pasi shkel mbi një minë, një snajper i marinës duhet të luftojë i vetëm kundër armiqve dhe elementëve të natyres, derisa të mbërrijë një skuadër shpëtimi.
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik

programme.title: Klani
programme.desc: Historia e vertete e familjes Puccio nga Buenos Airesi, te cilet mbanin peng ne shtepine e tyre burra e gra te pasur ne kembim te shperbleses. Gjate viteve '80 ata rrembyen kater persona dhe vrane 3 prej tyre.
programme.category: Biografi
thriller

programme.title: Ti më kupton
programme.desc: Një vajzë e re fiksohet rrezikshëm pas djalit me të cilin kaloi vetëm një natë pasioni dhe transferohet në gjimnazin e tij, e dëshpëruar për të mbajtur gjallë "romancën" e tyre.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Armiku tek porta
programme.desc: J.Law, E.Harris, R.Weisz. Një duel i pamëshirshëm mes një snajperi gjerman dhe atij më të mirit rus nën sfondin e betejës historike të Stalingradit. Beteja mes dy shteteve do të shndërrohet në një konflikt mes dy burrave.
programme.category: Histori
lufte

programme.title: Makina e policit
programme.desc: Kevin Bacon. Kur 2 djem rreth 10 vjeç gjejnë një makinë policie te braktisur, ata vendosin ta grabisin. Por vendimi i tyre i nxituar do t'i futë në një lojë të rrezikshme me sherifin e qytezës, i cili fsheh një sekret të errët.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Trafiku
programme.desc: Dy të dashuruar që vendosin të kalojnë një fundjave romantike larg qytetit, bëhen shenjestra e një bande të rrezikshme kriminelësh, të gatshëm të bëjnë gjithçka për të mbrojtur sekretet e tyre të errëta.
programme.category: Horror
thriller

programme.title: Vrasje gjakftohtë
programme.desc: 2019. Jean Reno. Një vrasës legjender tërhiqet në qetësinë e një shtëpie të izoluar buzë liqenit. Takimi rastësor me një grua dhe sekreti që ajo fsheh, mund ta detyrojnë atë t'u rikthehet mënyrave të tij vdekjeprurëse.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Gëzuar Ditën e Vdekjes
programme.desc: 2017. Një studente fillon të ripërjetojë ditën e vrasjes së saj, dhe e vetmja mënyrë për të ndalur horrorin është të zbulojë identitetin e vrasësit.
programme.category: Horror
thriller

programme.title: Kujdes i përkryer
programme.desc: Marla (Rosamund Pike) ka ngritur një biznes shumë të suksesshëm, bazuar në mashtrim. Ajo zotëron një azil, për njerëz të moshës së tretë, dhe me një skemë të mirëmenduar u përvetëson të moshuarve çdo pasuri që ata zotërojnë. Por jeta e Marlës vihet në rrezik, kur ajo mashtron Jenniferin (Dianne Wiest), mamanë e një krimineli...

programme.title: Pasi u njohëm 3
programme.desc: Me Josephine Langford, Hero Fiennes Tiffin, Louise Lombard. Bazuar në romanin best-seller të Anna Todd, ky është filmi i tretë i ciklit 'Pasi u njohëm'. Pikërisht kur Tesa merr vendimin më të rëndësishëm të jetës së saj, gjithçka papritur përmbyset. Gjërat që ajo zbulon për të kaluarën e të dashurit të saj Hardin, kërcënojnë të prishin planet dhe të ardhmen e tyre si çiftit.

programme.title: Familja Adams 2
programme.desc: Në përpjekje për të qënë më afër njëri tjetrit në familje, Gomez, Morticia dhe pjesa tjetër e klanit Adams, nisin një udhëtim aventuresk me kamperin e tyre të vecantë. Në pushimet e tyre të paharrushme, ata do të takojnë personazhe të reja, shumë të cuditshme.

programme.title: Ushtria e hajdutëve
programme.desc: Nëpunësi i turpshëm i bankës Sebastian (Matthias Schweighĳfer) është i magjepsur nga bravat dhe kasafortat. Ai është numri 1 në zhbllokimin e tyre. Papritur ai rekrutohet nga një grua misterioze (Natalie Emmanuel), për të hapur dhe me pas grabitur, 4 kasafortat më të pamundura në Evropë.

programme.title: Pasi u njohëm 3
programme.desc: Me Josephine Langford, Hero Fiennes Tiffin, Louise Lombard. Bazuar në romanin best-seller të Anna Todd, ky është filmi i tretë i ciklit 'Pasi u njohëm'. Pikërisht kur Tesa merr vendimin më të rëndësishëm të jetës së saj, gjithçka papritur përmbyset. Gjërat që ajo zbulon për të kaluarën e të dashurit të saj Hardin, kërcënojnë të prishin planet dhe të ardhmen e tyre si çiftit.

programme.title: Skuadra Vetëvrasëse
programme.desc: Me Margot Robbie, Idris Elba, John Cena etj. Harli Kuin, Sportgjaku, Paqebërësi dhe një grup super kriminelësh, bashkohen me Task Forcën sekrete X dhe dërgohen në ishullin e largët, të mbushur me armiq, Korto Maltese. Ata duhet të gjejnë një shkencëtar të lig dhe të parandalojnë lëshimin e një ylli deti alien, që mund të shkatërrojë botën.

programme.title: Kujdes i përkryer

programme.title: The Ugly Truth
Gola istina
programme.desc:
The Ugly Truth: Directed by Robert Luketic. With Katherine Heigl, Gerard Butler, Bree Turner, Eric Winter. An uptight television producer takes control of a morning show segment on modern relationships hosted by a misogynistic man." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1142988/","name":"The Ugly Truth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2MTM2OTUwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTgwNTE0Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An uptight television producer takes control of a morning show segment on modern relationships hosted by a misogynistic man.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1142988/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Filmaholic78"},"dateCreated":"2009-08-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Another GREAT Romcom for 2009","reviewBody":"I now believe that 2009 should be dubbed the year of the Romcom.

I was dragged to see the proposal by my girlfriend and thought it was hilarious. When she wanted to go and see The Ugly Truth I found myself putting up less of a fight this time. And I'm glad.

This film is HILARIOUS. I have to say I enjoyed almost every second from start to finish. It truly is designed for both men and women with fantastic views on romance, sex, attraction etc from both sides.

Acting is great, story is great and the chemistry between Katherine Heigl and Gerard Butler works very well on screen.

To sum this film up I have to say watch it. Make your own mind up. programme.title: Green Lantern
Zelena svetiljka
programme.desc:
Green Lantern: Directed by Martin Campbell. With Ryan Reynolds, Blake Lively, Peter Sarsgaard, Mark Strong. Reckless test pilot Hal Jordan is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers that inducts him into an intergalactic police force, the Green Lantern Corps." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1133985/","name":"Green Lantern","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQ1YTIxNzEtMzcxNC00NTUzLThkZjktMmJlYTcyMjBhMGUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Reckless test pilot Hal Jordan is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers that inducts him into an intergalactic police force, the Green Lantern Corps.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1133985/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Fields201"},"dateCreated":"2011-06-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's Not Easy Being Green.....","reviewBody":"I went to see Green Lantern because a friend of mine was boycotting DC for such a long time because there has been no release of a Green Lantern movie. Sure, there were plenty reincarnations of Batman and Superman, but where's Green Lantern? Someone out there listened to his plea, and the result is this.....

A mess.

I will go on record to say that it's at least enjoyable. Even though the movie seems to be everywhere in its storytelling, with characters being underdeveloped and random things just happening. I would say that during this movie, I had a hard time finding a bathroom break. I was at least interested to see where the movie is going.

Let me try to explain this movie: There is this elite group of Green Lanterns led by Sinestro (well played by Mark Strong) who are having a hard time beating this giant alien in the Milky Way called The Parallax. So when their alien friend who's name I cannot remember falls to earth and dies, his ring is sent out to choose a new victim, and somehow it chooses Ryan Reynolds. Mr. Reynolds discovers that he has a new ability, and that he is the earth's only hope, but he can't handle that until the end of the movie. Not only that, but some doctor guy turns into an evil alien which, I guess, is controlled by Parallax, and Ryan has to stop him too.

I must say that I was intrigued by the doctor subplot where he is not accepted by his father (Tim Robbins) and slowly goes insane until he turns into John Travolta from Battlefield: Earth. I also liked seeing Ryan Reynolds in the movie because he brings energy to what could otherwise be a boring movie, and I was enjoying both stories that were coming along. The problem is that the whole movie felt disjointed, and not only did scenes felt random, but events turn random too.

Like the scene where Reynolds is chosen by the ring. It just happens out of nowhere. One minute he's talking to this kid (which never served much purpose to the film) and then all of a sudden he's walking and gets carried away in green light to that dying alien dude. This happened in more than one occasion. Also the CGI was all over the place, even on Reynold's outfit, and it's rather distracting. It's very vibrant and colorful (which is good), but it looked very cartoonish and took me out of the film. I also mentioned that the characters are underdeveloped, which goes a lot to Sinestro and that Parallax thing they are trying to fight. Heck, even the love interest felt underdeveloped. By the end of the film, I felt like I barely knew the characters, with just a likable performance by Ryan Reynolds.

However, Green Lantern isn't boring, just purely average. I think the reason why I sort of liked this film was that I went into it not expecting much. I already had groups of people telling me that this film is awful before its release, so I ended up getting a little more than I expected. Just a little. It was still entertaining, to say the least.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":277967,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-06-17","keywords":"comicbook movie,ring,spacecraft,alien,magical ring","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Green Lantern - 3D Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3445005593","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDA3NDkxNjQ3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzAzOTgzNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDA3NDkxNjQ3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzAzOTgzNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe. more Â»"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005351/","name":"Ryan Reynolds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0515116/","name":"Blake Lively"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0765597/","name":"Peter Sarsgaard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0132709/","name":"Martin Campbell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033149/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0075528/","name":"Greg Berlanti"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0338169/","name":"Michael Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0973233/","name":"Marc Guggenheim"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="
